entry.string: User Information

entry.string: Acceptance of Terms of Use and Amendments

entry.string: Each time you use or cause access to this web site, you agree to be bound by these
entry.translation: Varje gång du använder eller skapar tillgång till den här webbplatsen, förbinder du dig att följa dessa

entry.string: and as amended from time to time with or without notice to you. In addition, if you are using a particular service on or through this web site, you will be subject to any rules or guidelines applicable to those services and they shall be incorporated by reference into these
entry.translation: och som emellanåt ändras med eller utan att meddelas dig. Dessutom, om du använder en viss tjänst på eller genom den här webbplatsen, kommer du vara föremål för eventuella tillämpbara regler eller anvisningar för dessa tjänster och de skall omfattas som referens i dessa

entry.string: Our Service

entry.string: Our web site and services provided to you
entry.translation: Vår webbplats och tjänster som tillhandahålls till dig

entry.string: on and through our web site on an "AS IS" basis.You agree that the owners of this web site exclusively reserve the right and may, at any time and without notice and any liability to you, modify or discontinue this web site and its services or delete the data you provide, whether temporarily or permanently. We shall have no responsibilty or liability for the timeliness, deletion, failure to store, inaccuracy, or improper delivery of any data or information.
Your Responsibilities and Registration Obligations
entry.translation: Dina skyldigheter och registreringsåtaganden

entry.string: In order to use this web site, you must
entry.translation: För att använda webbplatsen, måste du

entry.string: register
entry.translation: registrera dig

entry.string: on our site, and agree to provide truthful information when requested.
entry.translation: på vår webbplats och samtycker till att lämna sanningsenlig informatinon där så krävs.

entry.string: You must also be at least the age of #(1) (#(2)) or older.
entry.translation: Du måste även vara åtminstone #(1) (#(2)) eller äldre.

entry.string: When registering, you explicitly agree to our
entry.translation: När du registrerar dig, samtycker du att utan invändningar följa våra

entry.string: and as may be modified by us from time to time and available here.
entry.translation: och som kan komma att ändras av oss emellanåt och finns tillgängliga här.

entry.string: Registration data and other personally identifiable information that we may collect is subject to the terms of our
entry.translation: Registrationsdata och annan personlig identifierbar information som vi kan samla in är föremål för villkoren enligt vår

entry.string: Registration and Password
entry.translation: Registrering och lösenord

entry.string: You are responsible to maintain the confidentiality of your password and shall be responsible for all uses via your registration and/or login, whether authorized or unauthorized by you. You agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use or your registration, user account or password.
entry.translation: Du är ansvraig för att bibehålla säkerheten för ditt lösenord och kommer vara ansvarig för all användning via din registrering/inloggning, oavsett godkänd eller ej av dig. Du samtycker till att omedelbart meddela oss eventuellt obehörigt användande av din registrering, användarkonto eller lösenord.

entry.string: Your Conduct
entry.translation: Ditt uppförande

entry.string: You agree that all information or data of any kind, whether text, software, code, music or sound, photographs or graphics, video or other materials ("Content"), publicly or privately provided, shall be the sole responsibility of the person providing the Content or the person whose user account is used. You agree that our web site may expose you to Content that may be objectionable or offensive. We shall not be responsible to you in any way for the Content that appears on this web site nor for any error or omission.
entry.translation: Du samtycker till att all information eller data av något slag, oavsett text, mjukvara, kod, musik eller ljud, fotografier eller grafik, video eller annat materiel ("Innehåll"), offentligt eller privat tillhandahållet, skall vara personen som tillhandahåller innehållets eller personen vars användarkonto som används ensamma ansvar. Du samtycker till att vår webbplats kan framställa för dig Innehåll som kan vara anstötligt eller förargelseväckande. Vi ska inte vara ansvariga gentemot dig i något sätt för innehållet som förekommer på den här webbplatsen eller för eventuella fel eller underlåtenhet.

entry.string: You explicitly agree, in using this web site or any service provided, that you shall not:
entry.translation: Du samtycker till utan reservationer, genom användning av den här webbplatsen eller annan tillhandahållen tjänst, att du inte kommer:

entry.string: provide any Content or perform any conduct that may be unlawful, illegal, threatening, harmful, abusive, harassing, stalking, tortious, defamatory, libelous, vulgar, obscene, offensive, objectionable, pornographic, designed to or does interfere or interrupt this web site or any service provided, infected with a virus or other destructive or deleterious programming routine, give rise to civil or criminal liability, or which may violate an applicable local, national or international law;
entry.translation: tillhandahålla något Innehåll eller utföra något beteende som kan vara olovligt, olagligt, hotande, skadligt, smädligt, trakasserande, förföljande, orättmätigt, baktala, förolämpa, vulgärt, obscent, förargelseväckande, anstötligt, pornografiskt, framtaget eller förorsakar avbrott av den här webbplatsen eller tillhandahållna tjänster, infekterad med ett virus eller annan destruktiv eller skadegivande programmeringsrutin, ge upphov till civil eller krimiell ansvarsskyldighet, eller som kan bryta mot tillämplig lokal, nationell eller internationell lag;

entry.string: impersonate or misrepresent your association with any person or entity, or forge or otherwise seek to conceal or misrepresent the origin of any Content provided by you;
entry.translation: impersonifiera eller missrepresentera din förening med en person eller enhet, eller förfalska eller på annat sätt dölja eller missrepresentera ursprunget på Innehåll tillhandahållet av dig;

entry.string: collect or harvest any data about other roles;
entry.translation: hämta eller samla in data om andra roller;

entry.string: provide or use this web site and any Content or service in any commercial manner or in any manner that would involve junk mail, spam, chain letters, pyramid schemes, or any other form of unauthorized advertising without our prior written consent;

provide any Content that may give rise to our civil or criminal liability or which may constitute or be considered a violation of any local, national or international law, including but not limited to laws relating to copyright, trademark, patent, or trade secrets.
Submission of Content on this Web Site
By providing any Content to our web site:

you agree to grant to us a worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive right and license (including any moral rights or other necessary rights) to use, display, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, distribute, perform, promote, archive, translate, and to create derivative works and compilations, in whole or in part. Such license will apply with respect to any form, media, technology known or later developed;
you warrant and represent that you have all legal, moral, and other rights that may be necessary to grant us with the license set forth in this Section 7;

you acknowledge and agree that we shall have the right (but not obligation), in our sole discretion, to refuse to publish or to remove or block access to any Content you provide at any time and for any reason, with or without notice.
Third Party Services.

Goods and services of third parties may be advertised and/or made available on or through this web site. Representations made regarding products and services provided by third parties are governed by the policies and representations made by these third parties. We shall not be liable for or responsible in any manner for any of your dealings or interaction with third parties.
Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless, our subsidiaries, affiliates, related parties, officers, directors, employees, agents, independent contractors, advertisers, partners, and co-branders from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorney's fees, that may be made by any third party, that is due to or arising out of your conduct or connection with this web site or service, your provision of Content, your violation of this
or any other violation of the rights of another person or party.
DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES

YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THIS WEB SITE AND ANY SERVICES OR CONTENT PROVIDED (THE "SERVICE") IS MADE AVAILABLE AND PROVIDED TO YOU AT YOUR OWN RISK. IT IS PROVIDED TO YOU "AS IS" AND WE EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, IMPLIED OR EXPRESS, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

Some jurisdictions may not allow disclaimers of implied warranties and the above disclaimer may not apply to you only as it relates to implied warranties.
LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INDICENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSS (EVEN IF WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES), RESULTING FROM OR ARISING OUT OF (I) THE USE OF OR THE INABILITY TO USE THE SERVICE, (II) THE COST TO OBTAIN SUBSTITUTE GOODS AND/OR SERVICES RESULTING FROM ANY TRANSACTION ENTERED INTO ON THROUGH THE SERVICE, (III) UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR ALTERATION OF YOUR DATA TRANSMISSIONS, (IV) STATEMENTS OR CONDUCT OF ANY THIRD PARTY ON THE SERVICE, OR (V) ANY OTHER MATTER RELATING TO THE SERVICE.
In some jurisdictions, it is not permitted to limit liability and therefore such limitations may not apply to you.
Reservation of Rights

We reserve all of our rights, including but not limited to any and all copyrights, trademarks, patents, trade secrets, and any other proprietary right that we may have in our web site, its content, and the goods and services that may be provided. The use of our rights and property requires our prior written consent. We are not providing you with any implied or express licenses or rights by making services available to you and you will have no rights to make any commercial uses of our web site or service without our prior written consent.
